name: Koding stacked files
description:
Koding IDE narrows file tabs when you have many of them opened instead of stacking them like other IDEs. With this style, you can have them as in the image shown.
Also I added a slight change to the tabs text contrast.
additional_info: This a a second version of a custom theme that allows to have more visible tabs in a more comfortable way and also it makes a better use of the available space
